mapper.sql: id, shop_id, food_type_title, food_title, food_price, food_head_img_url, food_describe_img_url, food_options, remark, status, create_time, update_time

nf.id as "id", nf.shop_id as "shopId", nf.food_type_title as "foodTypeTitle", nf.food_title as "foodTitle", nf.food_price as "foodPrice", nf.food_head_img_url as "foodHeadImgUrl", nf.food_describe_img_url as "foodDescribeImgUrl", nf.food_options as "foodOptions", nf.remark as "remark", nf.status as "status", date_format(nf.create_time, '%Y-%c-%d %H:%i:%s') as "createTime", date_format(nf.update_time, '%Y-%c-%d %H:%i:%s') as "updateTime"
mapper.update:
update n_food nf
nf.shop_id = #{shopId},
nf.food_type_title = #{foodTypeTitle},
nf.food_title = #{foodTitle},
nf.food_price = #{foodPrice},
nf.food_head_img_url = #{foodHeadImgUrl},
nf.food_describe_img_url = #{foodDescribeImgUrl},
nf.food_options = #{foodOptions},
nf.remark = #{remark},
nf.status = #{status},
nf.update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
where 1=1
and nf.id = #{id}
and nf.shop_id = #{shopId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) total from n_food nf

SELECT
,nc.foodNum FROM n_food nf LEFT JOIN ( SELECT nf1.id, ifnull(sum(JSON_EXTRACT(JSON_EXTRACT(no.foods_num, CONCAT("$.foodId_is_", nf1.id)), "$.foodNum")), 0) AS "foodNum" FROM n_food nf1 JOIN n_order no WHERE nf1.shop_id = #{shopId} AND no.foods_num IS NOT NULL GROUP BY nf1.id ) nc ON nf.id = nc.id
